extension.summary: Automatically adds extra artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Beef automatically adds extra artwork for TV shows and movies into your library. It grabs them from wonderful web services and the file system.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork sources: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database
extension.news:
v0.11.1 (2017-09-05) - Fix: reporting error for new users
v0.11.0 (2017-09-02) - Feature: add option to override image language (defaults to Kodi interface language) - Feature: generate a report of all changed artwork - Feature: add option to prefer posters without a title - Feature: use HTTPS for all API and image URLs - Feature: add option to generate thumbnail from video files (disabled by default) - Fix: rematch movie sets when the Kodi library is rebuilt - Fix: a few Leia compatibility changes
